message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I've done some research and I think it's a bit pricey at $14,000.
I understand your perspective, Bob, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $12,500.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000.
